span.a: ESL - English as a Second Language

li.a: Weekly Student Internet Activity Sign-Up Form

p.strong: Effective immediately, The Wilmington Area School District, in accordance with Governor Wolf's recommendations, will require individuals to stay in their vehicles during Grab n Go pickup. Items will be placed in trunks only. Moving forward, you will not be permitted to approach any of our staff without a facial covering. If you are not in compliance, you will not be permitted to pick up. Providing meals to our children during this difficult time is our goal, but safety is and remains our top priority.

div.p: The Wilmington Area School District has been given approval by the State to offer its Grab n' Go lunch service to all District residents age 18 and younger during the COVID-19 closure. Breakfast and Lunch can be picked at the following sites on Tuesdays & Fridays from 8:00 a.m. - 9:00 a.m. starting on Tuesday, April 14 at the following locations:

Pick-up on Tuesdays will include (1) breakfast & (1) lunch per child for Tuesday, Wednesday & Thursday. Pick-up on Fridays will include (1) breakfast & (1) lunch per child for Friday, Saturday, Sunday & Monday. Children do not need to be present during the pick-up. If you have any questions, please contact Joshua Latore, Business Manager, at latore@wasd.school.

p.br:
300 Wood Street
New Wilmington, PA 16142
Phone: 724-656-8866
Fax: 724-946-8982

div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.
